Summary Marc leads the Google for Education sales and business development efforts in Spain, Italy, German speaking countries (DACH) and part of the UK at Google as part of the Google for Work organization. 
 
Previously spent over one year as an Online Media Strategist guiding SMEs through the vast world of online marketing and was part of the Google for Entrepreneurs board in Dublin. 
 
Very passionate about Entrepreneurship as a student Marc already discovered the potential of young entrepreneurs and co-founded the Entrepreneurship Student Club at ESADE Business School - E3 Initiative. During his Master's Degree the idea evolved into E3 Union, the national version of E3 Initiative which fosters youth entrepreneurship by doing and through the creation of Entrepreneurship Clubs in universities. Marc is also a founding member of iCUE - the International Consortium of University Entrepreneurs - where associations like E3 Union from 20+ countries connect and engage in a sort of United Nations of Young Entrepreneurs Organization. 
 
Recent after graduation he co-founded HAIL Studios - a videogame startup that aims to bring a real and deep gaming experience to mobile. Their current project is Clockwork Damage. Check their Official YouTube Channel - www.YouTube.com/HAILChannel 
 
Passionate about Tech, Entrepreneurship, Education and Jazz... in that order but all at the same time. 
 
Specialities: Innovation, Global Strategy, Information Systems, Online Media, Guerilla Marketing and Business Model generation. Summary I am currently a Business Development Manager at Google focused on developing the SMB segment across Sub-saharan Africa. I have over 10 years experience spanning various functions including business development, strategy, marketing, branding, finance and corporate governance. I have also worked across across various sectors / industries including technology, finance, retail, media, real estate, infrastructure and public sector. Prior to joining Google in 2011, I worked for consulting company, Accenture as a Strategy consultant and prior to that, I worked with leading Nigerian entrepreneurs one of which is the Silverbird Group. I am passionate about the SMB segment as well as growing world-class local enterprenuers. In my spare time, I mentor young startups. I have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of Lagos and a Masters in Management and Strategic Information Systems from the University of Bath, United Kingdom.
